536:1: atha khalu sarasvatī mahādevyekāṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat |
536:2: ahamapi bhadanta bhagavan sarasvatī mahādevī tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣorvākparibhūṣaṇārthāya pratibhāṇakamupasaṃhariṣyāmi |
536:7: vismaritāni ca tānyahaṃ sarvāṇi tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ suniruktatapadavyañjanānyupasaṃhariṣyāmi |
536:9: yathā cāyaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarājasteṣāṃ buddhasahasrāvaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya ciraṃ jambudvīpe pracaret |
536:11: anekāni ca sattvānīmaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ śrutvā cintya tīkṣṇaprajñā bhaveyuḥ |
536:12: acintyaṃ ca jñānaskandhaṃ pratilabhante ca na duṣṭameva cāyuḥ |
536:16: tadidaṃ saṃyuktaṃ snānakarma bhāṣiṣyāmi tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣosteṣāṃ ca dharmaśravaṇikānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya |
536:19: auṣadhayo mantrā yena snāpayanti ca paṇḍitāḥ |
536:20: vacā gorocanā spṛkā śirīṣaṃ śyābhyakaṃ śamī |
536:24: samocakaṃ turuṣkaṃ ca kuṅkumaṃ musta sarṣapāḥ |
536:28: tadyathā | sukṛte karajātabhāge haṃsaraṇḍe indrajālamalilaka upasade avatāsike kutra kukalavimalamati śīlamati saṃdhibudhamati śiśiri satyasthita svāhā ||
536:39: ane nayane hili hili gili khile svāhā ||
536:40: bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ snātvānena mantrajāpena snānaśāntiṃ yojayet |
536:43: ye prasthitā nakṣatrā āyuḥ pālayantu caturdiśe |
536:54: namo bhagavatyai brāhmaṇyai namaḥ sarasvatyai devyai sidhyantu mantrapadāstaṃ brahma namasyantu svāhā |
536:55: etena snānakarmaṇā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhakṣorarthāya teṣāṃ ca dharmaśravaṇikānāṃ lekhakānāmārthāya svayamevāhaṃ tatra gagaṇasiddhayakṣadevagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ tatra ca grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā vihāre vā sarvato rogapraśamanaṃ kariṣyāmi |
536:57: yathā teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ jīvitānugraho bhavet |
536:61: sādhu sādhu sarasvati mahādevi bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipanno yattvayā hīmāni mantroṣadhisaṃyuktāni bhāṣitāni |
536:62: sā ca sarasvatī mahādevī bhagavataḥ pādāvabhivandanāṃ kṛtvaikānte niṣaṇṇā ||
536:63: atha khalvācāryavyākaraṇaprāptaḥ kauṇḍinyo mahābrāhmaṇastāṃ sarasvatīmāvāhayati sma ||
536:69: jihvābhimukhaṃ ca sattvānāṃ bhāṣantu vacanaṃ śubham || 12 ||
536:71: sure vire araje arajavati hi gule piṅgale piṅgale vatimukhe marīcisumati diśamati agrāmagrītalavitale ca vaḍivicarī mariṇipāṇaye lokajyeṣṭhake priyasiddhivrate bhīmamukhiśacivarī apratihate apratihatabuddhi namuci namuci mahādevi pratigṛhṇa namaskāra |
536:72: sarvasattvānāṃ buddhirapratihatā bhavatu vidyā me siddhyatu śāsralokatantrapiṭakakāvyādiṣu |
536:75: vicaratu mama vicaratu me māyā sarvasattvānāṃ ca bhagavatyā devyāḥ sarasvatyā anubhāvena kadārake yuvati hili mili āvāhayāmi mahādevi buddhasatyena dharmasatyena saṃghasatyena indrasatyena varuṇasatyena ye loke satyavādinaḥ santi |
536:77: hili hili mili vicarantu mama mantrino māyā sarvasattvānām |
536:78: namo bhagavatyai sarasvatyai siddhyantu mantrapadāḥ svāhā ||
